title: T(ype)-shirts?
content:
Hey fellas

Yesterday my wife pilled up all my old t-shirts and said - losely translated - “go polish our car with these” and I said “but honey, what am I surposed to wear then?”. “Buy new ones” was her blunt answer...so guys... help me out here. Im looking for some really cool type t-shirt to fill up my empty closet.

Do you know if typophile has some or maybe some of you are seeling your designs?

Thanks kindreds

Mark

 [‹ where to find free chinese fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906154633/http:/typophile.com/node/13874 "Go to previous forum topic") [The Day that Gutenberg Died: Anybody have a transcript/video/audio from TypeCon 04? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906154633/http:/typophile.com/node/13847 "Go to next forum topic")
author: TheMark

comments.content:
[cafepress.com/marksimonson](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906154633/http:/cafepress.com/marksimonson)  
( Lovely Lettering Leisure Wear, by fellow Typophile [Mark Simonson](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906154633/http:/www.marksimonson.com/).. :)

\> [typeoff.de/?p=34](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906154633/http:/typeoff.de/?p=34)  
( ’ [..the design is an homage to Experimental Jetset and just as much of an homage to the four type designers whose names it bears..](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906154633/http:/typophile.com/node/13572)’ )

\> [typotheque.com/site/tshirts.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906154633/http:/typotheque.com/site/tshirts.php)

\> [houseind.com/index.php?page=clothing](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906154633/http:/houseind.com/index.php?page=clothing)

\> [emigre.com/Tshirt.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906154633/http:/emigre.com/Tshirt.php)

\> [philsfonts.com/gfshirt.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906154633/http:/philsfonts.com/gfshirt.html)

\> [veer.com/products/gallery.aspx?gallery=214](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906154633/http:/veer.com/products/gallery.aspx?gallery=214)

Zara... Formlos...

Thanks guys... its a lot of help...

ROCK N ROLL

Mark,  
Copenhagen Denmark

Try CakeType.

[http://www.caketype.com/cakeworld\_fashion.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906154633/http:/www.caketype.com/cakeworld_fashion.html "http://www.caketype.com/cakeworld\_fashion.html")

And have a nice day!

Pieter
A friend just clued me in to a great [t-shirt blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906154633/http:/preshrunk.info/) yesterday. So much good stuff!

it looks like these will be available soon.  
I know I want them.

[http://www.psyops.com/html/p\_dummy.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906154633/http:/www.psyops.com/html/p_dummy.html "http://www.psyops.com/html/p\_dummy.html")

Design your own and let others vote on it.  
 [http://threadless.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906154633/http:/threadless.com/ "http://threadless.com/")  
Tim
